Token.Abstract: Calls the given cloud function with the parameters passed in.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The parameters to send to the function.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The response from the cloud function.

Token.Abstract: Calls the given cloud function with the parameters passed in and sets the error if there is one.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The parameters to send to the function.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Pointer to an NSError that will be set if necessary.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The response from the cloud function. This result could be a NSDictionary, an NSArray, NSInteger or NSString.

Token.Abstract: Calls the given cloud function with the parameters provided asynchronously and calls the given block when it is done.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The parameters to send to the function.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: The block to execute. The block should have the following argument signature:(id result, NSError *error).

Token.Abstract: Calls the given cloud function with the parameters provided asynchronously and runs the callback when it is done.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The parameters to send to the function.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: The object to call the selector on.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to call. It should have the following signature: (void)callbackWithResult:(id) result error:(NSError *)error. result will be nil if error is set and vice versa.
